description:
Add PRESUBMIT.py to tools/sharding_supervisor/

While it's being deleted relatively soon, it's easier to have checks in.

R=csharp@chromium.org
BUG=

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=179444

messages.text:
https://codereview.chromium.org/12079037/diff/1/tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py
File tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12079037/diff/1/tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py#newcode258
tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py:258: buf = StdioBuffer(shard)
Why change buffer to buf?

https://codereview.chromium.org/12079037/diff/1/tools/sharding_supervisor/stdio_buffer.py
File tools/sharding_supervisor/stdio_buffer.py (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12079037/diff/1/tools/sharding_supervisor/stdio_buffer.py#newcode21
tools/sharding_supervisor/stdio_buffer.py:21: buf = cStringIO.StringIO()
Why buffer to buf?

https://codereview.chromium.org/12079037/diff/1/tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py
File tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12079037/diff/1/tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py#newcode258
tools/sharding_supervisor/sharding_supervisor.py:258: buf = StdioBuffer(shard)
On 2013/01/29 01:34:18, csharp wrote:
> Why change buffer to buf?

buffer is a builtin, so this code is aliasing it;
http://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html#buffer
